p: In the case of acetone, the activity value of the mother extract was intermediate between all fractions; the antioxidant activity increases in the direction SA11 > SA5 > SA10 > FA > SA2 > SA4 > SA1 > SA3. The three most active fractions, SA11, SA5, and SA10, all had an IC 50 lower than FA but not comparable to the reference ascorbic acid.
